picked_headlines.summary: CNN enhances pneumonia detection from X-rays, improving clinical integration.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: The article bridges AI and healthcare, showcasing a practical application of deep learning in medical diagnostics, appealing to both technical and managerial audiences.

picked_headlines.summary: Persify automates personalized order workflows for Etsy and Amazon sellers.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: This product-oriented article highlights AI's role in e-commerce, offering insights into automation and scalability, relevant to stakeholders and engineers alike.

digest:
- *DeepSearch* integrates Monte Carlo Tree Search into RLVR training, achieving state-of-the-art results with fewer resources. [https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.25454]
- *KG-R1* enhances knowledge graph efficiency via reinforcement learning, improving adaptability. [https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.26383]
- *DualTune* enhances local LLMs for better task automation accuracy. [https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.00229]
- *Apriel-1.5-15b-Thinker* achieves high performance through innovative training methods. [https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.01141]
- *Q-ROAR* improves quantized LLMs' long-context performance without retraining. [https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.00028]
- *Sparse State Expansion* enhances linear attention in Transformers, achieving state-of-the-art results. [https://arxiv.org/abs/2507.16577]
- *AdaBlock-dLLM* introduces adaptive block sizing for improved inference in diffusion LLMs. [https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.26432]
- *GEM* is an open-source simulator for training LLMs through experience-based learning. [https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.01051]
- *TransIP* introduces a novel Transformer-based approach for inter-atomic potentials, enhancing efficiency. [https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.00027]
- *MULTI-TAP* improves image-text alignment across multiple objectives. [https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.00766]
